channel.title: Papersextras on L. Brustenga i Moncusí
channel.description: Recent content in Papersextras on L. Brustenga i Moncusí

item.description: Disguised toric dynamical systems Code for Figure 6, generated with POV-Ray CC BY-SA 4.0 /*équations : x^2*y^2-4y^3-4x^3*z-27*z^2+18*x*y*z;# forme 2 */ #version 3.7; global_settings { assumed_gamma 1.0 } #include "colors.inc" #include "textures.inc" // pre-defined scene elements #include "shapes.inc" #include "glass.inc" #include "metals.inc" #include "woods.inc" #include "stones.inc" #declare r=0.02; // Cameras (to play with) #declare Cam1 = camera { // orthographic location <5,4,10> look_at <0,0,0> // right x*image_width/image_height // angle 78 rotate <90,0,90> } #declare Cam2 = camera { // orthographic location <15,3.
